page.title: 16OAKMOOR HOUSE
page.content: Oakmoor House is in Durley and is a boys school for boys who have problems with school work and thus do not attend ordinary schools.It was built in 1850.The school only caters for 28 boys;at the moment there are 18.In the grounds there is a swimming pool and some of the houses there, which are in the grounds used to be stables and coachouses. The staff of Oakmoor House have seen two ghosts.One is of a man on the balcony,and the other of a lady on the drive.Some other things happened,party music has been heard at dawn.Some people say that the ghost is a coach with horses, coming out at 10 o'clock. Oakmoor House is surrounded by trees and is about 50 acres,with no streams running through.
